page.title: 12Local Events. Summer l985.
page.content: All sorts of events take place at the {Exeter Festival}in May and June. School children gave displays of gymnastics, country dancing, drama, instrumental, orchestral, and choral music. The Festival ended on June 8 with a firework display in{Rougement {Gardens}as 200 young wind players accompanied it with Handel's "Music for the Royal Fireworks" and "The Water Music" was performed on the canal aboard one of the{Exeter {Maritime Museum's}larger boats. Also during May an 80ft. catamaran, the largest multihull ever built in Britain, was launched into the{River} {Exe}at{Topsham.}In it yachtsman Peter Philips hopes to win the Round Britain Yacht Race which sets sail on 2nd July. At the end of May the 50th anniversary of{V.E. Day}was celebrated by many local organisations.
